revised_title: Generalized Retarded Products and their Applications in Quantum Field Theory
tldr: The article discusses the concept of generalized retarded products, a generalization of the retarded commutator, and its applications in quantum field theory. The author presents a proof of its causal property and a new proof of its relation to -matrix elements, providing a generalization of the work of Lehmann, Symanzik, and Zimmermann. The generalized retarded product is defined and its properties are investigated, including its connection to -matrix elements and dispersion relations.
